nodes.text: The VL-22 Plasma Core Rifle was a model of plasma blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The VL-22 Plasma Core Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Wild Space Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on September 1, 2015.
